docs.snippet: Uruguay striker Luis Suarez had surgery on his left knee Thursday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguay striker Luis Suarez had surgery on his left knee Thursday.

headline.main: Uruguay Star Striker Luis Suarez Has Knee Surgery
headline.print_headline: Uruguay Star Striker Luis Suarez Has Knee Surgery

docs.snippet: Newcastle United defender Paul Dummett has received death threats from angry Uruguay fans who blame him for the injury that has put striker Luis Suarez's World Cup campaign in doubt, British media reported on Friday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Newcastle United defender Paul Dummett has received death threats from angry Uruguay fans who blame him for the injury that has put striker Luis Suarez's World Cup campaign in doubt, British media reported on Friday.

headline.main: Newcastle's Dummett Gets Death Threats Over Suarez Injury
headline.print_headline: Newcastle's Dummett Gets Death Threats Over Suarez Injury

docs.snippet: Real estate prices in the oceanfront communities north of Punta del Este have been rising but were affected by Argentina's economic downturn.
docs.lead_paragraph: Real estate prices in the oceanfront communities north of Punta del Este have been rising but were affected by Argentina's economic downturn.

headline.main: Along the Beach in Uruguay, Where the Living Is Easy
headline.print_headline: Along the Beach in Uruguay, Where the Living Is Easy

docs.snippet: Organizers aim to galvanize voters and support Latino candidates as Dominican-Americans become increasingly active in politics, especially in the Northeast.
docs.lead_paragraph: Organizers aim to galvanize voters and support Latino candidates as Dominican-Americans become increasingly active in politics, especially in the Northeast.
docs.abstract: Grupo Vicini, namesake company of one of the wealthiest and most powerful families in the Dominican Republic, is backing a multistate effort to register Dominican-Americans to vote and increase civic participation as Dominicans become more active in United States politics, especially in Northeast.

headline.main: Dominicans Begin to Flex Political Muscle
headline.print_headline: Dominicans Begin to Flex Political Muscle

docs.snippet: The long struggle over Guantánamo Bay is again reverberating as a Federal District Court judge lifted an order barring the force-feeding of a Syrian detainee.
docs.lead_paragraph: The long struggle over Guantánamo Bay is again reverberating as a Federal District Court judge lifted an order barring the force-feeding of a Syrian detainee.
docs.abstract: Seemingly unending struggle over Guantanamo Bay prison is again reverberating as Federal Judge Gladys Kessler lifts order barring the force-feeding of Syrian detainee Jihad Ahmed Mujstafa Diyab; Diyab has been held for 12 years without a trial and has gone on prolonged hunger strikes; decision underscores stubborn dispute over whether to close or expand Guantanamo.

headline.main: Guantánamo Inmate’s Case Reignites Fight Over Detentions
headline.print_headline: U.S. Judge Decides ‘Anguishing’ Case on Force-Feeding

docs.snippet: During a weekend in the capital city, sample everything from meat to music to museums.
docs.lead_paragraph: During a weekend in the capital city, sample everything from meat to music to museums.
docs.abstract: Paola Singer travel article on 36-hour visit to Montevideo, Uruguay.

docs.snippet: Japan qualified for the 2015 rugby World Cup by thrashing Hong Kong 49-8 in Tokyo on Sunday, claiming a seventh Asian Five Nations title in the process with their 28th consecutive bonus point win.
docs.lead_paragraph: Japan qualified for the 2015 rugby World Cup by thrashing Hong Kong 49-8 in Tokyo on Sunday, claiming a seventh Asian Five Nations title in the process with their 28th consecutive bonus point win.

headline.main: Japan Win Asian Five Nations, Qualify for World Cup
headline.print_headline: Japan Win Asian Five Nations, Qualify for World Cup

docs.snippet: Lobbyists urged Jamaica's government Sunday to move within 120 days to decriminalize pot and establish a local medical marijuana industry.
docs.lead_paragraph: Lobbyists urged Jamaica's government Sunday to move within 120 days to decriminalize pot and establish a local medical marijuana industry.

headline.main: Lobbyists Call for Jamaica to Decriminalize Pot
headline.print_headline: Lobbyists Call for Jamaica to Decriminalize Pot

docs.snippet: Uruguay striker Luis Suarez is progressing "very well" after undergoing keyhole surgery on his left knee although his chances of playing at the World Cup are still in the balance, the team doctor said on Monday.
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguay striker Luis Suarez is progressing "very well" after undergoing keyhole surgery on his left knee although his chances of playing at the World Cup are still in the balance, the team doctor said on Monday.

docs.snippet: Uruguay star striker Luiz Suarez is recovering well from knee surgery, and the national team doctor refuses to rule him out for the World Cup.
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguay star striker Luiz Suarez is recovering well from knee surgery, and the national team doctor refuses to rule him out for the World Cup.

headline.main: Uruguay's Luis Suarez Recovering From Knee Surgery
headline.print_headline: Uruguay's Luis Suarez Recovering From Knee Surgery
